title: 9.2 preparation: Added Tazavesh mapping, added new route coverage overview and many bugfixes

changelog.description: 9.2 preparation: Added Tazavesh mapping, added new route coverage overview and many bugfixes

changes.change: Added a new route coverage overview, showing you what dungeons and affixes you still need to create or find routes for.
Added Encrypted affix to map view (though we probably want to get some better support for it later).
Added new M+ season with Encrypted as its affix
Adding a new pull with shift + click will now insert this pull behind your currently selected pull (if any).
Added Guardian Druid Incarnation map icon.

By default, all pulls are now connected with a line similar to the dungeon preview image so you can more easily follow the flow of a route. You can disable this in the left sidebar under Elements -> Pull connections.
Added Tazavesh: Streets of Wonder and Tazavesh: So'leah's Gambit. Note: MDT importer/exporter not supported yet.
Adjusted health values and enemy forces of all Shadowlands dungeons (including Tazavesh) with expert help from Forced and Marlamin from the WoW.tools and WoW Trace Discord.
Removing a kill area from a pull now properly syncs this action to all others viewing the route.
Removing a kill area now syncs this action to all others viewing the route.
Switching floors while having the left sidebar expanded no longer causes descriptions to disappear.
Switching floors and using the browser back button now navigates you back to the previous floor(s).
Fixed ghost tooltips of enemy %-ages in map view when using route synchronization with others.
